short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes scores added to your Netflix. Woof.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choosing a movie for the night? 

Score Dog adds IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes scores under each movie on Netflix. 

Navigate to the Netflix Movies page, select the icon from your extension bar, and let Score Dog get to work!  

===================================

See more at https://github.com/dunleavyjack 

Icon art by Jeonghye Yoon :)
